channel.title: [317] Cheat Engine
channel.description:
Somebody found a glitch where they can change the ID of what they're buying from the shop to whatever they want, with a program called Cheat Engine 5.6.1 or something.
How can I stop this before it ruins my server?
I've found a tutorial on how to stop cheat CLIENTS and spambots (which i did), but nothing about cheat ENGINES

item.title: [317] Cheat Engine
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

[quote=“jailed, post:4, topic:358488”][quote author=frozon566 link=topic=454997.msg3331680#msg3331680 date=1283535494]
cheat engines cant ruin a server because there just spawning items that arent real for example they can spawn armour,cash etc but cant equip it, use it to buy anything. dont worry about it.
[/quote]

you my friend are thinking about cheat CLIENT!
cheat ENGINE is something way else. its a program that can change 1 number to another number in
like in this case he changed one of the item id’s in the shop to the santa hat id.

this should not rly be possible with rsps’s and rs but this guy obviously found a way and idk how to fix, but im sure some pro guy out there knows! so keep looking before your economy gets ruined by him. that would be rly sad :([/quote]

You are wrong. They both do the same thing.
The Cheat Engine changes the id. The cheat client also changes the id in the server.

Normally this doesn’t cause a problem as the server knows what the item really is but in some cases the server is really shit and doesn’t have checks.

Thus the telegrab glitch in Czar for example.

Spawn item on ground via client. (Item doesn’t actually exist for anyone else only on your client)
Telegrab item.
Czar doesn’t check to see if item is real and just gives you the ID of the item you clicked sent by the client.
You now have say a free party hat.

It is extremely easy to do.

My advice = get a new server your current one sucks and you wont be able to work out how to fix it

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Cheat Engine
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

free wayne:

well, yeah, that solves it for a while. But there are tutorials on how to use the cheat engine and stuff all over youtube. I’m going to have to worry that someone will do it again until someone shows me how to fix it :\ if there’s even a way.

well you shouldnt rly worry that much, because this guy gotta be some of a pro if he is able to use cheat engine to cheat with on a rsps, because i actually never seen anyone do this. just like 5000 attempts on youtube lol.

Read full topic
